bibl.title: Paying prostimon for New Vineyard Land (T. BM inv.no. EA 56920). A Bilingual Set of Wooden Tablets from the Archive of Horos, Son of Nechouthes.
bibl.note: Edition of T. BM inv.no. EA 56920. - A bilingual set of wooden tablets from the archive of Horos, son of Nechouthes. - A parallel set of wooden tablets from the archive of Peteharsemtheus, son of Panebchounis. - Paying prostimon or qns in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.seg: Katelijn Vandorpe & Klaas A. Worp, Paying prostimon for New Vineyard Land (T. BM inv.no. EA 56920). A Bilingual Set of Wooden Tablets from the Archive of Horos, Son of Nechouthes.

Edition of T. BM inv.no. EA 56920. - A bilingual set of wooden tablets from the archive of Horos, son of Nechouthes. - A parallel set of wooden tablets from the archive of Peteharsemtheus, son of Panebchounis. - Paying prostimon or qns in Ptolemaic Egypt.
